description.black-white:
On the second turn, an ultracold,
freezing wind surrounds the target.
This may leave the target with a burn.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
effect.shortEffect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
